meanings.definition: A muscle that contracts to bend a joint.
meanings.sent1: The flexor in my arm helps me bend my elbow.
meanings.sent2: I can feel the flexor in my leg working when I kick a ball.
meanings.sent3: The flexor in my hand decided to take a break right before the arm wrestling competition.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the flexor that bent the rules in her favor.
meanings.sent5: The flexor, like a loyal servant, faithfully obeys the command to bend the joint.

meanings.definition: A device that allows for movement or bending.
meanings.sent1: The new flexor on my phone makes it easier to adjust the screen angle.
meanings.sent2: The robotic arm had a flexor that enabled it to pick up objects.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the TV remote, activating the flexor and changing the channel.
meanings.sent4: The flexor on the gate creaked as it swung open, welcoming us inside.
meanings.sent5: With a simple push, the flexor on the door smoothly allowed passage into the room.
